features: Water Drawing Mat:Large size.Ocean pattern.Be easy to use.Can be folded into the compact size.Portable for indoor outdoor and travel.A great learning toy for toddlers.A good interaction toy for boys and girls.
Doodle Drawing Mat Size: 40 x 28 inch. Package included: Mat x 1 + Pens x 6 + Drawing mold x 8 + Drawing template x 4 + Drawing booklet x 1- For age 3 years old +

Water Doodle Mat Kids Toys - Reusable - Fill the pen with clean water and draw on the mat,after 3-10 minutes,it magically disappears(depending on temperature and airflow),and children can paint on the drawing mat again and again.

Educational Toys:No Ink,No Paint,Non-Toxic,Non-Polluting,Never make a mess.The back of the mat is water-resistant nylon material,clean and safety for kids. The traces will never be chaotic, satisfying the imagination and creativity of the kids' infinite painting.

Perfect Gift:Color packing box.This magical water painting pad allows your child to paint with friends on the table or floor,exercise hand-eye coordination and color perception,develop painting and creative skills.The best choice for kids birthday gift or christmas gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s educational and fun
reviews.reviewText: A my toddler loved the idea of putting water on some thing and watching it develop into letters pictures. It’s very educational. It’s fun for toddler and quite the learning experience.. I would recommend this to any toddler

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So much fun
reviews.reviewText: My son just turned 2 so he hasn't fully embraced the toy yet but I love that I can give him the water marker and not hover over him waiting to draw off the mat. I love the picture drawing guide. I'm not creative at all but I've been using it to draw my son pictures and he seems to enjoy them! Really cute and mess free craft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my kiddos for Christmas and they absolutely love it! Easy to use for the 2 year old and keeps the 9 year old entertained for a long time. The youngest gets water everywhere but that's user error lol. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple to use
reviews.reviewText: Easy, very clean, simple to use, entertains for hours

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps my 3years old busy
reviews.reviewText: Love it! It’s not messy and keeps my baby busy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My kid loves it. It’s fun and has hidden animals and the abc. You can play with your kiddo and show the artist you have inside. The best of all is that it’s water. You don’t have to worry of cleaning the mess. It also dries so you can start again. Great for kids and parents.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fun Color Mat BUT...
reviews.reviewText: The concept of this mat is great, but there are two design flaws.1 - My toddler can very easily break apart the blue pens and splash the water everywhere.2 - The mat can be scratched/stained easily making it hard to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST gift ever!
reviews.reviewText: This is what you need to get your toddler/little kid if they looove to paint and you hate a mess! It’s provided hours of entertainment, and we use paintbrushes as well as the things that came with it. We throw it in the dryer on very low if they get impatient for it to dry!
